mainText:
To the family, friends and colleagues of the late Steve Jobs, I offer my
sincere condolences.

 

The fact that so many of us, from disparate countries and backgrounds, mourn
the passing of this

great technological visionary of the generation is testament to the impact
of his creative genius.

 

He changed the tech world.  Not many people manage that in their lifetimes.

 

I share your sadness.
author: Dave
